plot: A detailed bonus feature about a particular scene in which Bryan Cranston (as Walter White) tosses a pizza on the roof for the DVD/Blu-ray of 'Breaking Bad Season 3'.
title: Pizza of Destiny: Cranston's Greatest Shot
